mapper.select: WITH A AS(SELECT * FROM ALLOW_HISTORY WHERE SAL_NO = #{salNo} and EMP_CD=#{empCd} ) SELECT * FROM A RIGHT OUTER JOIN ALLOW USING(ALLOW_CD) WHERE (ALLOW_AMT IS NOT NULL OR ALLOW_USE='Y') ORDER BY SAL_NO,ALLOW_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALLOW_HISTORY (ALLOW_CD, EMP_CD, SAL_NO,ALLOW_AMT) SELECT '001',EMP_CD,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'),PO_SAL FROM EMPLOYEE INNER JOIN POSITION USING(PO_CD)
INSERT INTO ALLOW_HISTORY (ALLOW_CD, EMP_CD, SAL_NO,ALLOW_AMT) SELECT '003',EMP_CD,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'),200000 FROM EMPLOYEE
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OVERTIME WHERE OVER_START BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM') AND ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),-1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALLOW_HISTORY (SAL_NO,EMP_CD,ALLOW_CD,ALLOW_AMT) SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'),EMP_CD,'002', SUM(ROUND((TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OVER_END,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(OVER_START,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))* 24 * 60, 2)/60)*10000 AS MM FROM ATTENDANCE A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM OVERTIME WHERE OVER_START BETWEEN TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM') AND ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),-1) )O ON(A.ATTE_NO=O.ATTE_NO) GROUP BY EMP_CD
mapper.delete: DELETE ALLOW_HISTORY WHERE SAL_NO=#{salNo} and EMP_CD=#{empCd} and ALLOW_CD=#{allowCd}
